Text: The Clear Creek Meeting House is a Friends meeting house located at 14365 N. 350th Ave., southeast of McNabb, in Magnolia Township, Putnam County, Illinois.

<Text: Clear Creek Meeting House:  The Yearly Meeting was the westernmost annual meeting of the Hicksite Friends and attracted followers from several states.>

Text: Clear Creek Meeting House:  The building is typical of American Friends meeting houses; it features two square rooms with plain features both outside and inside.

<Text: Clear Creek Meeting House:  The lack of ornamentation was designed to reflect the Quaker tenet of simplicity.>
